participant_1.background:
I am a 14 year old trans boy.
I love pink floyd.
I go to middle school.
I want to be an actor when i grow up.
I love dogs but hate cats.

participant_2.background:
I was arrested for stealing.
My parents were always gone when i was growing up.
My best friend took my boyfriend in high school.
I want children badly but not right time in my life.
I want to be a fashion designer.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
I like to do those things too! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different types of games, but my favorites are action-adventure games.
I love action-adventure games too! What's your favorite one?
My favorite one is The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
That's a great game! I've played it too.
What did you think of it?
I thought it was amazing! The gameplay was really fun, and the world was huge and beautiful.
I agree! I loved exploring the world and finding new things.
Me too! I spent so much time just exploring and finding secrets.
I know what you mean! I still haven't found everything in the game.
Me neither! I think it's going to be a long time before I find everything.
I'm sure it will! I'm excited to keep playing it.
Me too! I'm glad we have the same taste in video games.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
